parameters: \lsoffJust looking at it, you feel calm and soothed...
\lsoffEach of you came your brains out while praying!
\lsoffYour body shivers as you look over the Goddess' curves and thighs...
\lsoffYour wetness drips onto the tiled floor...
\lsoffAre you really getting turned on from praying to this statue?
\lsoffYou look up at The Goddess, smiling at Her peacefully and happily... \!What a good servant you are.
\lsoffYour underwear is soaked... \!You don't feel like getting up or getting out of your praying position.
\lsoffIt feels really good to pray like this...
\lsoffYou can feel the Goddess taking care of all your problems and worries...
\lsoffYou pray silently at the feet of the statue...
\lsoffIt seems to bear no magic aura.

\}...Such a naughty little idol~♥
...Can't do anything... but dream of stroking my cock...♥

\}...Such a naughty little crystal~♥
...Can't do anything... but dream of rubbing my pussy...♥
...What took you so long? Trying to get out of paying me...?
Carry me around in your pocket... I'm just a worthless little trinket~♥
Oh! Uhh... Heh heh... Hi again~!
...At last. Take that long again to restore me and I'll make you a permanent addition to the Chateau...
Good Goddess almighty, that was one of the strangest things...
Thank you... That was a sort of immortality I'd much rather forego...
Hello, my children... Are you in need of aid?
...I have heard the legends, I suppose, but...
In any case, we would be honored to help you in whatever ways we can.
Glory be to the Goddess. Do not forget her in your times of need, as that is when she listens most closely.
As Sister Stultia left, our congregation left with her!
She wouldn't say where she was going... And she didn't even really seem to want the others following her...
How bizarre! May the Goddess send more faithful to us in due time...
All of a sudden, our congregation left!
There didn't seem to be any reason as far as I could tell...
Oh, Goddess, I do hope we have not displeased you...
The Cathedral of the Spirit, huh...?
One of them, Urania, was a Demon-slaying machine.
Looks like they're a lot more popular now than they were back then, but...
...There's no mistaking it. I smell demonic influence.

\!
Demons are weak to holy magic. They wouldn't step a toe in a place like this.
Maybe I'm just feeling like a shepherd in a world without wolves...

\!
I am Maritus, Lady Lyra's butler, as you may recall.
Lady Lyra is ready for you now.
Psst... Thank you for what you did...
Sister Stultia used to be such a kind soul...
Sister Stultia used to be such a kind soul...
\!But in her cruelty, she was cruelly punished in turn...
*Ahem* ...In any case, I am the Cathedral's lawful officiator of marriage ceremonies of all kinds.
If you were to have need of my services, Your Highness, it would be my highest honor to officiate a wedding for you!
If the Royal Family were to have need of my services, it would be my highest honor to officiate a wedding for you!
If the Royal Family were to have need of my services, it would be my highest honor to officiate a wedding for you!
If you were to have need of my services, Your Highness, it would be my highest honor to officiate a wedding for you!
If the Royal Family were to have need of my services, it would be my highest honor to officiate a wedding for you!
If the Royal Family were to have need of my services, it would be my highest honor to officiate a wedding for you!
\lsoff(So this is where I'd have my wedding...)
\lsoff(I can't decide if having my wedding above that demonic cesspit is horrible or oddly exciting...)

\!
(...But I have to propose to my bride-to-be first.)
\lsoff(G- Goddess... I haven't even thought about that...)

\!
(But I *am* the Princess of Gianna... I'm going to have to find a wife someday...)

\!
(It's been said that shared hardship paves the way to deeper relationships, but...)
\lsoff\>Want to know more about Flirting and marriage?
\lsoffFlirt is a Special-category skill that can only be used in battle by \N[1] and only while she has the Princess class.
\lsoffFlirt can be used once and recharges its use after every battle (or Bad End).
\lsoffWhen using Flirt, \N[1] targets a single ally and tries to flatter or entice her. This generally increases her Attraction to \N[1], but may do nothing or decrease it, depending on her status.
\lsoffTake note that \C[17]you can only flirt with an ally once for each state she can be in.
\lsoffFor example, if you flirt with an ally while she is Aroused, you cannot do so again, but you may flirt with her if she is cured or becomes Horny.
\lsoffOnce an ally's Attraction reaches 200, you will need to find an appropriate place to propose to her. After that, she will be willing to marry you.
\lsoff\C[17]You may only choose one wife per save file, \C[0]so make your choice wisely!
Ahh... It feels like years since I oversaw a wedding...
Two childhood friends, blossoming into love...
A Princess and her bodyguard, falling in love...
The Princess of Gianna and the Mayoress of Sea Market...

\!
It was truly an honor to be a part of this historical moment!!
Who could've guessed that our beloved Princess would marry such a striking beauty from the Southern Continent?

\!
And yet, unlikely love is often the sweetest!
A Princess and a lowly commoner, falling in love despite their differences in station...
I can't say I've ever met anyone like the Princess' new bride...

\!
But as they say, love is blind!
I can hardly believe it - Princess \N[1], marrying Madame \N[8] of the Chateau d'Yterre!

\!
Truly, I have officiated a high-class marriage!

\!
Well... I admit, if I think about what one of those beasts could do on your honeymoon... ♥♥

\!
I wish you both the very best!!
Could the rumors be true... that the Princess' new bride is actually the dreaded Puppetmaster...?!

\!
It's true that I felt a chill looking into her eyes...
